ing: 1 large mango - peeled, seeded, and diced
n: Mango-Mint Lassi with Indian Sweet Spices
des: "It's a great take on the famous Mango Lassi that you tend to see at various Indian restaurants because it takes the flavor to a higher and much more complex level."
ins: Blend the mango, brown sugar, chopped mint, star anise, cardamom, lime juice, and yogurt in a blender on high speed until smooth. Pour into glasses and garnish with fresh mint sprigs to serve.
